"Xiemmy": "Losey"
"H-Hello, um... Thank you for coming to see me. I'll introduce myself again."
"I am Xiemmy. I work in the technological department, and I'm in charge of equipment development..."
"Which leads me to the topic at hand..."
"I... Well, I have someone helping me with equipment research, you see..."
"His name is Losey, and, well, he's an ARKS Veteran..."
"Um, he used to do missions as part of the combat division..."
"We got to talking about other people who could help, and that's when your name came up..."
"Ho there, Xiemmy! Is that the one I was tellin' ye about?"
"Mr. Losey?"
"Sorry fer callin' ye outta the blue like this. Sure have been hearin' lots about ye, though!"
"As ye can see, I'm long since past my prime."
"So I've been thinkin' about who could take my place helpin' out Xiemmy here."
"That's when you came to mind! You'd be perfect for, uh... the whatsit..."
"Xiemmy, remind me... What was this assignment about again?"
"Um, gathering combat data on... Symbol-marked enemies."
"Aye, that's what it was! I'd wager that sorta thing is right up yer alley."
"So whatcha say? Will ye take on the job?"
"Mr. Losey, is it okay to just..."
"B-But, well, I'll ask as well. Please help us with the data collection."
"We don't know of anyone else to ask..."

"How was it? Are ye gonna be alright?"
"Y-Yeah. It's more than sufficient..."
"Well then, it looks like I can officially retire."
"Hey. Take good care of Xiemmy, will ye?"
"...Don't say it like that..."
"Listen, Xiemmy's a rather timid sort, but as an engineer, she's as reliable as they get."
"I couldn't count the number of times I've been saved by somethin' she designed."
"So I guess from now on, Xiemmy's gonna be the one takin' good care of you."
"Mr. Losey..."
"Thank you for all your help."
"Aye! That bein' said, this ain't no last goodbye or anythin'."
"As a senior of the combat division, I'm gonna start trainin' ARKS."
"So I reckon we ain't seen the last of each other."
"Anyways, I'll see y'round, you two."
"...Yeah."
"So... um, this might feel like it's been... kind of forced onto you, but..."
"If you're not against it, would I be able to... ask you for help again in the future?"
"You'll be... paid accordingly, of course."
"Yes, well then, um... I look forward to working with you."
"Mr. Losey, has always been... the one helping me with my research..."
"I'm just a little... nervous about this, I guess..."
"Going forward, I... Um, well, thank you for your help."
"...Oh, regarding equipment, um... If you need anything... Please let me know."
